name: 撮影スタッフ
text:
はい、カメラ回りまーす……
５秒前
trans:
Alright, cameras are rolling.
Going live in 5────

name: にちか
text:
ピアノを知らない異星人たちが
ある夜、調査のため立ち寄った館で奇妙な黒い箱を見つける
trans:
One night, several aliens land their ship by a
building to investigate. These aliens have never heard
of a piano. There, they discover a curious black box.

name: にちか
text:
『なんだろう、これは』
なめらかな木肌が月明かりをわずかにはじいている
trans:
"I wonder what this could be?"
The smooth wood of the box shines faintly in the
moonlight.

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
それでは恒例のコーナー
箱の中身はナンダフ～ル！
trans:
Now it's time for one of our regular segments,
"WHATSAFUL in the Box～!".

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
ワンダフ～ルなシークレットゲストさんと協力して、
手探りで箱の中身を当てていただきましょう
trans:
Working together with today's WONDERFUL secret
guest, it's time to try and figure out what's in this
box using only your sense of touch.

name: にちか
text: 彼らはめいめいに箱を撫でまわす
trans: The aliens each feel the box in turn.

name: にちか
text:
しかし暗がりでは全貌を眺めることも難しい
そもそも、箱なのだろうか
trans:
However, in the darkness it is difficult to
understand the object as a whole. 
In any case, it seems to be a box of some kind.

name: 番組スタッフ１
text: ────緋田さん、そろそろ移動お願いしまーす
trans: ────Aketa-san, it's nearly time for you to go on.

name: 美琴
text: ……はい
trans: ...Alright.

name: 番組司会者
text:
レギュラーメンバーからは七草ちゃんがエントリーね～
どう？　今回３連覇かかってるけど
trans:
From our regular cast, Nanakusa-chan will be
participating today～ Any words? If you get it right,
it'll make for your third consecutive win.

name: にちか
text: あ、はーい。超平常心ですねー
trans:
Oh, I guess that's right.
You know, nothing I wouldn't call business as usual.

name: お笑い
text:
おーい、今週も憎たらしさ半端ねぇなー！
クソガキ度は完全に３連覇してますよ
trans:
Oof, you're as hateful as ever this week!
Guess you're aiming to win "Biggest Brat" three
times in a row, too.

name: にちか
text:
うわ煽りとかほんと大丈夫ですー。ていうか暴言で笑い取る
とかやっぱり番組のコンプライアンスやばくないですー？
trans:
Sheesh, no need to try and rile me up.
Anyway, isn't using blatant hate speech to get
laughs some kind of code violation?

name: お笑い
text:
な……っ、え、どっちが煽り！？
オメーのこと帰ったら母ちゃんに言うわ、待っとけ！
trans:
Wha... Hey, who's the one doing the riling here?
After you go home tonight I'm gonna come by and
tattle to your mommy, just you wait!

name: にちか
text:
はっ？　怖！
じゃ私もお母さんに言いますー
trans:
The heck? You creep!
Do that and I'll tattle to your mother, too.

name: ディレクター
text:
始まった始まったー
今週も快調
trans:
Oh, and there they go!
Another week of quality television.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……はは
どうも、恐れ入ります……
trans:
...Haha.
Thanks for having her...

name: 番組スタッフ２
text: ──あ、緋田さんおはようございますー！
trans: ──Oh, good morning Aketa-san!

name: 美琴
text: おはようございます
trans: Good morning.

name: 番組スタッフ３
text:
今日のこと、スタッフみんなすごく楽しみにしてたんですよ
どうぞよろしくお願いします！
trans:
The staff have all been really looking forward to this.
Thank you so much for coming!

name: 美琴
text:
はい、こちらこそ
よろしくお願いします
trans:
Yes, thank you for having me.
I'll do my best out there.

name: 番組スタッフ３
text: 緋田美琴さん、入られまーす……！
trans: Mikoto Aketa, going on set...!

name: 美琴
text:
脚を見つけた者が言う
『これは台車に違いない』
trans:
"This is a push cart, there's no doubt about it,"
says the alien who found the base.

name: 美琴
text:
弦を見つけた者が言う
『これは罠に違いない』
trans:
"This is a snare, there's no doubt about it,"
says the alien who found the strings.

name: 美琴
text:
蓋を見つけた者が言う
『これは棺に違いない』
trans:
"This is a coffin, there's no doubt about it,"
says the alien who found the lid.

name: にちか
text:
──あ、この前みたいにべちょべちょのとかチクチクのとか
入ってないですよねー？　ほんとゲストさんに失礼なので
trans:
──Oh, it's not gonna be something gooey or prickly
like you've subjected us to before, right?
It's rude to make our guests touch that stuff.

name: 番組司会者
text:
アハハ。だって、スタッフ～
今日だいじょぶなヤツ～？
trans:
Ahaha. You hear that, crew～?
Hopefully it's something inoffensive～?

name: お笑い
text:
てか、コイツの態度の方が心配っすよ
失礼ないようにな、にちか！
trans:
Hey, I think this kid's attitude is more likely to
offend the guest than whatever is in the box.
Remember to play nice, Nichika!

name: にちか
trans: The heck? Eh────

name: にちか
text:
『呼び捨てほんとやばいなー……！　あとTPOわかんない
やつみたいな印象操作やめてもらえたら嬉しいですー』
trans:
[Calling me "Nichika" sure is rude...! And I'd really love
for you to stop trying to falsely paint me as someone
who doesn't know there's a time and a place.]

name: ディレクター
text: あはっ、言うねー
trans: Ahah, she knows just the thing to say, doesn't she!

name: プロデューサー
text: ……す、すみません
trans: ...I-I do apologize.

name: ディレクター
text:
すみませんて、あはは。責めてなくて
彼女わきまえてるよねぇ────
trans:
Oh, no need to be sorry. 
That's not a criticism. 
The kid knows her place well────

name: にちか
text: べーっ
trans: *sticks out tongue*

name: ディレクター
text: ────誰にキレたら許してもらえるか
trans:
────Is there someone out there who could make her
lose it for real?

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
さて、それでは
本日のワンダフ～ルなゲストをご紹介しましょう
trans:
Well then, I think it's about time for us to introduce
today's WONDERFUL guest.

name: にちか
text:
テレビでしゃべって笑われる
ろくに踊れなくてもちやほやされる
trans:
Yapping away on TV and getting laughed at.
Getting fawned over when I can hardly even dance.

name: 番組司会者
text:
３連覇なるか
今回七草ちゃんと組んでくれるのはこの方────
trans:
Will you score that third consecutive win?
Nanakusa-chan, you will be playing alongside───

name: にちか
text:
リアクションバラドル見参
見てろ────
trans:
Observe! The role of a ridiculous reaction fodder
"variety show idol"────

name: 女性アナウンサー
text: シーズの緋田美琴さんです……！
trans: Mikoto Aketa, from SHHis...!

name: 美琴
text:
こんにちは
緋田美琴です
trans:
Hello.
I'm Mikoto Aketa.

name: にちか
trans: Mikoto-san──────!

name: スタッフ
text: 斑鳩ルカさんがご使用でした
trans: This room was utilized by Luca Ikaruga previously.

name: にちか
text:
やがて彼らは
鍵盤を見つける
trans: Eventually, the aliens find the keys.

name: 美琴
text: 音が鳴る
trans: There is a sound.

name: 番組司会者
text:
ワハハ、驚いてるねぇ～
緋田チャン今日ありがと、ご無沙汰～
trans:
Wahahah, we really threw her for a loop～
Thanks for coming on today, Aketa-chan.
Long time no see.

name: 美琴
text:
ご無沙汰しています
お元気そうで──……
trans:
It's been a while, hasn't it.
I'm glad to see you're doing w──

name: お笑い
text:
緋田美琴サンだぁ～～！！
美しい～～！！！
trans:
Mikoto Aketa is here～～!!
And she's drop-dead gorgeous～～!!!

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
日頃から息を合わせて練習されているおふたり
サプライズでも以心伝心プレーが期待されますね、七草さん
trans:
I'd figured that y'all being unit partners who are
always practicing together and totally in tune meant
the surprise would get spoiled, Nanakusa-san.

name: にちか
text:
全然聞いてませんでした……！
美琴さんに来てもらえるなんて────
trans:
No, I had absolutely no idea...!
To think you'd get Mikoto-san, of all people────

name: にちか
text:
──すみません、べちょべちょとかチクチクとか生きもの
絶っっ対NGでお願いしますーーーー！
trans:
──Excuse me, please ensure that the box doesn't 
have anything gooey, or prickly, and definitely not
anything that's alive inside it!

name: 美琴
text: 音が鳴る
trans: There is a sound.

name: にちか
text:
じゃ美琴さん……！　あの、先に私、ガッていくので、
無理されずに待っててくださいね……！
trans:
Okay, Mikoto-san...! Um, I'll stick my hand in first to
test the waters. So, please wait just a moment, you
don't need to force yourself...!

name: 美琴
text: ……うん

name: 美琴
text: ありがとう
trans: Thanks.

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
それではトライしていただきましょう
箱の中身はナンダフ～ル！
trans:
Alright, it's time to start the game.
WHATSAFUL in the box～!

name: にちか
text: えいっ────
trans: Here goes────

name: にちか
text: ギャーーーーーーー！！！
trans: GYAAAAAAAH!!!

name: ルカ
text: ────グラス、全部磨いたよ
trans: ────I finished drying off all the glasses.

name: ルカ
trans:
────!
Hey, Mama...?

name: ルカ
text:
……っ
またビールケースなんか運んで……！
trans:
....Augh.
There you go trying to haul beer cases all on your
own again...!

name: ルカ
text:
──ねぇ、こういうの誰かにやってもらってよ
ママ……
trans:
──Hey, you should hire someone else to do this
heavy lifting for you.
Mama...

name: お笑い
text:
あはははは！
にちか、うっせー！！
trans:
Ahahahahah!
Nice shriek, Nichika!!

name: にちか
text:
みっ、美琴さんそーっと小指とかからいってみてください！
ふぁさっみたいななんかヘンなヤツでやばいです……！
trans:
M-Mikoto-san, why don't you use your pinky finger
to try just barely touching it!
It's some kind of freaky silky thing, so be careful...!

name: 美琴
text:
そうなんだ
動く……？
trans:
I see.
Is it alive...?

name: にちか
text:
えっ、うご……えっと
待ってください、もう一回いきますね────！
trans:
Eh, a-alive...? Ummm.
Please wait a moment, I'll try touching it again
to check────!

name: ゲストの料理家
text:
おー、張りきっちゃってる
やっぱり相方さんいらっしゃると生き生きするんだねぇ
trans:
Oho, would you look at that enthusiasm.
It does figure that having her partner here would
liven her up.

name: にちか
trans: ────Partner.

name: にちか
text: いきます──────
trans: Here goes nothing──────

name: にちか
trans: [────I-It's moving...!]

name: ディレクター
text:
──このふたりってさぁ
円満なカンジ？
trans:
──Say, does everything seem peaceful between
the two of them?

name: 美琴
text: それじゃ、私も触ってみようかな
trans: Well, I should probably try touching it myself now.

name: お笑い
text:
美琴サンっ
気を付けて～～！
trans: Be careful, Mikoto-san～～!

name: にちか
text:
……っ
すみません、『緋田さん』でお願いしますー！
trans:
...Guh.
Excuse me! Call her "Aketa-san", please!

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
さぁ、それでは緋田さんもいよいよファーストタッチ
おふたりでトライしていただきましょう
trans:
Okay, it's time for your first touch Aketa-san.
How about you both try touching it at the same time.

name: にちか
text: 無理！　って思われたら、すぐやめてくださいね……！
trans:
If it's too much for you, please feel free to pull your
hand out at any time, Mikoto-san...!

name: にちか
text: せーの────
trans: Here goes────

name: ディレクター
text:
ほら、今日ね
あっちのスタジオ、斑鳩ルカ来てたから
trans:
Oh it's just, you see, earlier today Luca Ikaruga
happened to be working in the studio down the hall.

name: ディレクター
text:
デビューした頃かなぁ、事務所も推してて
ボク一回、あのふたり番組呼んだことあるんだよなぁ
trans:
I guess back around when their unit debuted?
I brought the two of them on the show once, see.
We had a deal with that agency.

name: プロデューサー
text: ──ああ、緋田は以前からご縁があるんですよね
trans: ──I see, so you've worked with Aketa before.

name: ディレクター
text:
んー。でもなんかあの時の感じと違うなと思って
言われない？
trans:
Mm-hmm. But, I dunno, the vibes between these two
now just aren't quite what her and Ikaruga had.
Do you get that a lot?

name: 番組司会者
text: 緋田チャン、どう～？
trans: What do you think, Aketa-chan～?

name: 美琴
text:
はい……
ふぁさっとしてます
trans:
Yes...
It's definitely silky.

name: お笑い
text: んおおお～！　擬音語だけで美しい～～～！！
trans:
Ouuugh～! Even her way of describing textures is
gorgeous～～～!!

name: にちか
text:
で、ですです！
ふぁさっ、ですよね……！
trans:
R-right, it sure is!
It's silky, isn't it...!

name: 美琴
trans: ────It also seems...

name: にちか
text:
あーっ！　ガチで動きますからこれ……！
やばいと思ったら引っ込めてくださいね……！
trans:
Eeek! This thing sure is moving a lot...!
Again, please pull your hand out if it's too much...!

name: 美琴
text:
うん……
……でも、大丈夫そう
trans:
Mm....
...I think I'll be alright, though.

name: にちか
text: 美琴さんの手
trans: Mikoto-san's hand.

name: 美琴
text:
青い月の光の下で
ピアノが音をたてる
trans:
Beneath the pale light of the moon, the piano is
being played.

name: 美琴
text:
────ごめんね
手、ぶつかっちゃった
trans:
────Oh, sorry.
I bumped into your hand.

name: にちか
text: い、いえ……！
trans: Oh, it's fine...!

name: にちか
text:
１音、２音、３音……
異星人たちがキーを叩く
trans:
One note, two notes, three notes...
The aliens tap the keys.

name: 美琴
text:
……
かなり毛が長いみたい────
trans:
......
It seems to have quite long hair────

name: 美琴
text: ────動いていないような気がする
trans: ────It doesn't seem to be moving.

name: にちか
text:
『４音、５音、６音……
音はもつれながら夜を泳ぐ』
trans:
Four notes, five notes, six notes...
The notes tangle in the depths of the night.

name: にちか
text:
────そ、そうですね……！
すみません、さっき自分で動かしちゃったのかもです……！
trans:
────I-It isn't moving, is it...!
I'm sorry, I guess I was the one making it move...!

name: にちか
text: ────綺麗、美琴さん
trans: ───Mikoto-san is so beautiful.

name: にちか
text:
──────
何、考えてるんだろう────
trans:
──────
I wonder what she's thinking.

name: 美琴
text: ……うん

name: にちか
text:
──────
わかったのかな
trans:
──────
I wonder if Mikoto-san knows.

name: 美琴
text: わかった気がする
trans: I think I know what it is.

name: にちか
text:
──は、はいっ
私もたぶん……！
trans:
──Y-yes.
I do, too. Probably...!

name: にちか
text:
……わかったのかな
──────あの相方さんは
trans:
...I wonder if she would've known.
──────Mikoto-san's former partner.

name: プロデューサー
text:
────それは……
……これから、長いふたりですから
trans:
────These two, well...
...They've got plenty of time ahead of them to grow
closer.

name: ルカ
text:
座ってて……！
そっちは私がやるから
trans:
Sit down, sit down...!
I can handle this for you.

name: ルカ
text: 無理しないで────
trans: You shouldn't work yourself so hard────

name: 女性アナウンサー
text:
それではシーズのお二方、
解答をお願いします……！
trans: Well then SHHis, please tell us your guess...!

name: にちか
text:
……いいか、そんなことどうでも
違ってたらボケる、合ってたらはしゃぐ────
trans:
...Whether I get it right or not doesn't matter.
If I get it wrong, I'll play the fool.
If I get it right, I'll jump around like an idiot.

name: にちか
text: ────そういうのは、私がやる
trans: ────Handling this disgraceful stuff, that's my role.

name: ルカ
text:
もしケガしたりしたら
お客さんも悲しむよ……。ね？
trans:
If you were to get injured, all your customers would
be devastated, too... You know?

name: にちか
text: 美琴さんはアイドルなんだから
trans: Mikoto-san is the one here who's actually an idol.

name: ルカ
text: ママはお姫様なんだから……！
trans: You're a princess, Mama...!

name: にちか
text: せーの────
trans: Here we go────

name: にちか＆美琴
text: 『ウィッグ』……！
trans: "A wig"...!

name: にちか
text:
異星人たちは、箱の正体を探ろうと
鍵盤を叩きつづけた
trans:
It was when the aliens tried to understand the box in
its entirety that they inadvertently hit the keys.

name: 美琴
text:
しかしそこに旋律を見いだす者も
豊かな和声を聞きとる者もいなかった
trans:
However, there was no one else there to observe
the alien's melody. No one else there to hear their
rich harmony.

name: 番組司会者
text:
正解～～
ちょっと七草ちゃん～、三連覇達成！
trans:
Correct～～
Look at you, Nanakusa-chan～
Three consecutive wins!

name: にちか
text: は、はい……！
trans: Y-yes...!

name: 美琴
text:
黒い箱は、月明かりの下で
依然ただの黒い箱だった
trans:
With only the pale moonlight there to judge it, the
black box was still nothing more than a black box.

name: にちか
text: 異星人たちが引き上げていく
trans: The aliens bring it back aboard their ship.

name: にちか
text: 美琴さんのおかげです────！
trans: It's all thanks to Mikoto-san────!

name: にちか
text:
綺麗な美琴さんでいてくれたら
────全然
trans:
If it allows Mikoto-san to remain beautiful... 
────I'll gladly sully myself.
